activities: BravoSolution DOES NOT disclose the personal data collected through it's website or software applications to third parties with the exception of any data expressly permitted by the operator of the software to share with trading partners in the normal course of business. This allowed disclosure includes the communication of data to authorized and authenticated system users sponsors about participants in online negotiation events. By participating in these events, users understand that their information will be supplied to the system operator and event manager.

recoursemech: If you feel that this company is not abiding by its posted privacy policy, you should contact Christopher G. Kuhn by phone at 610-240-0600; by email at ip@bravosolution.com; or by mail at 400 Chester Field Parkway, Malvern, PA 19355.  For any unresolved complaints, the organization will use the European Union Data Protection Authorities (EU DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) as its dispute resolution mechanism.
